name: U.F.O: Unidentified Friendly Object
description:
As a flying saucer, make friends with your enemies and join them to your cause!  Be careful, being bigger makes you easier to hit!

If you are experiencing issues on browser, try downloading the Windows version.  Thanks for playing, and have a good day!

Controls:

WASD - move

Right click - capture

Left click - shoot

Space - pause
